Detailed Description

Vam.

vamFilter is a command-line tool for the usage of the class Vam. It is invoked with a distance bound k, a compiled minimized dictionary dic and a file containing a set of patterns P. Please consult the documentation of class fsdict::Vam for details.

See also:
fsdict::Vam
Author:
Ulrich Reffle, <uli@cis.uni-muenchen.de>
